properties.name: app.fetch-messages.max-tries
properties.description: The number of tries the fetch message service tries to fetch a message from the AR.

properties.name: app.fetch-messages.interval
properties.description: The interval the fetch message service waits between one and another try to fetch a message from the AR.

properties.name: app.scheduled.fetching-and-confirming-existing-messages
properties.description: The interval for fetching and confirming existing messages, has to be a valid CRON expression.

properties.name: app.scheduled.status-logging
properties.description: The interval for the status logging, has to be a valid CRON expression.

properties.name: app.scheduled.recipient-query
properties.description: The interval for the recipient query, has to be a valid CRON expression.

properties.name: app.branding.favicon
properties.description: An url to a favicon. Can be a relative or an absolute url. Default is the agrirouter© middleware icon.

properties.name: app.scheduled.empty-message-cache
properties.description: The interval for the empty message cache, has to be a valid CRON expression.

properties.name: app.cache.transient-machine-registration-cache.time-to-live-in-seconds
properties.description: The time to live for a transient machine registration cache entry.

properties.name: app.scheduled.message-waiting-for-ack-removal
properties.description: The interval for the message waiting for ack removal, has to be a valid CRON expression.

properties.name: app.cache.message-cache.batch-size
properties.description: The batch size to send messages from the message cache to the AR.

properties.name: app.scheduled.statuspage-check-interval
properties.description: Status page check interval, has to be a valid CRON expression.

properties.name: app.agrirouter.status.url
properties.description: URL to fetch the current agrirouter© status.

properties.name: app.cache.message-cache.data-directory
properties.description: The data directory for the message cache.

properties.name: app.version
properties.description: Version of the application.

properties.name: app.build
properties.description: Build of the application.

properties.name: app.agrirouter.mqtt.health.status.wait.time.in-milliseconds
properties.description: The time to wait for the MQTT health status.

properties.name: app.subscriptions.ddi.range.start
properties.description: Start of the range for the DDI subscription.

properties.name: app.subscriptions.ddi.range.end
properties.description: End of the range for the DDI subscription.

properties.name: app.agrirouter.mqtt.synchronous.response.wait.time
properties.description: The time to wait for a synchronous response.

properties.name: app.agrirouter.mqtt.synchronous.polling.intervall
properties.description: The interval to poll for a synchronous response.

properties.name: app.cache.message-cache.batch-sleep-time-seconds
properties.description: The sleep time between two batches of the message cache.

properties.name: app.scheduled.sleep-time-between-queries-seconds
properties.description: Wait time between two message queries.
